# Skotte — Web Rebranding Studio

> San Diego's only web rebranding studio with in-house photography.

## About
Skotte is a husband-and-wife web rebranding studio based in San Diego, California. We combine custom-coded websites with professional brand photography to deliver complete business relaunches in 5 days.

## Team
- Peter Skotte — Web Developer (custom HTML/CSS/JS, SEO, performance)
- Khrystyna Skotte — Photographer & Designer (brand photography, visual direction)

## Services
- **Complete Web Relaunch** — Starting at $3,500
  - Custom-coded website (no templates or WordPress)
  - Professional brand photography session
  - Mobile-responsive design
  - SEO optimization and structured data
  - 95+ PageSpeed Insights score
  - 5-day turnaround

- **Monthly Retainers** (optional)
  - Maintenance: $299/mo
  - Growth: $599/mo
  - Full Service: $999/mo
